name: Moonshotz
description:
Moonshotz is  a  simple golf game set on the moon.

There are 9 holes of increasing difficulty,  and you have one less shot each time.

Use the LEFT MOUSE BUTTON to click on the power bars to give the ball the correct power and direction.

Good Luck!

Future ideas:

Multiplayer!

Uses:

Landscape  https://www.codementor.io/@nickwiggill/eye-openers-series-generating-and-smoothi...

Background https://www.rawpixel.com/image/1207204/moon-landing-photograph

Audio https://freesound.org/
